text: Indian equity benchmarks climbed in early Thursday trade, led by realty and auto stocks. The S&P BSE Sensex rose as much as 0.5 percent to 31,814.96 while the NSE Nifty 50 Index gained 0.5 percent as well to 9,964.Seventeen of the 19 sector gauges compiled by BSE Ltd. advanced led by S&P BSE Realty Index’s 0.9 percent gain. The market breadth was firmly tilted in favour of buyers. About 1,131 stocks advanced and 391 stocks declined on the National Stock Exchange.
title: Stocks Radar: Bharat Forge, Himachal Futuristic,  Reliance Industries
